title: Dreadspears
description: The bulk of Dark Elf armies, with spears as unwavering as their pride.

title: Bleakswords
description: Schooled in slaughter through a lifetime of survival.

title: Har Ganeth Executioners
description: In the name of Khaine and with draichs in their hands, furious brutality is brought to the battlefield.

title: Harpies
description: With savage claws and malicious temperament, to rip through enemies with grim delight.

title: Sisters of Slaughter
description: The Sisters of Slaughter are creatures of instinct, impossible to predict and unfathomably deadly.

title: Witch Elves
description: Crazed by poisonous concoctions, their dual daggers lacerate and shred for the Bloody-handed God.

title: Black Dragon
description: Poison, horns, claws and teeth; a myriad ways to destroy the foe.

title: War Hydra
description: A furious battlefield force; savage in combat and notoriously difficult to kill.

title: Bloodwrack Medusa
description: Stripped of their beauteous forms by the goddess Atharti, Medusae know nothing but pain, torment, regret and anguish.

title: Black Ark Corsairs
description: The cut and thrust of melee is child's play to those trained on tumultuous seas.

title: Feral Manticore
description: These incarnations of Khaine strike fear in to all those who stand before them.

title: Kharibdyss
description: A loathsome beast of uncharted depths possessing colossal strength and insatiable hunger.

title: Black Guard of Naggarond
description: The Witch King is defended, at halberd-point, from those who would do him harm. Imagine such a thing!

title: Darkshards
description: True to their name, they wither their enemies with volleys of black-tipped arrows.

title: Darkshards (Shields)
description: True to their name, they wither their enemies with volleys of black-tipped arrows.

title: Shades
description: Betrayed and outcast by their peers, they bring savage vengeance to any who cross them

title: Shades (Dual Weapons)
description: The twin blades of these spurned Elves are brought to bear with truly brutal results.

title: Shades (Greatswords)
description: The strength of these spiteful warriors is borne out by the horrific power of their weapons

title: Black Ark Corsairs (Handbows)
description: Defeat and conquest, at the end of a quarrel.

title: Doomfire Warlocks
description: Hollow-eyed murderers, the Doomfire Warlocks must loosen the grip of Slaanesh with the blood of others.

title: Cold One Dread Knights
description: Cavalry / Melee Cavalry / (wh2_main_def_cav_cold_one_knights_1)

title: Dark Riders (Repeater Crossbow)
description: Being everywhere and nowhere is their signature skill, with volleys of fire to harass the foe.

title: Cold One Knights
description: Armed with a mighty lance for a powerful charge, then enchanted swords to deliver punishment up close.

title: Dark Riders
description: Fast and nimble, dodging enemy fire to deliver incisive hit-and-run charges to enemy lines.

title: Dark Riders (Shields)
description: Their shields ensure that these riders can get in amongst the fray and remain there.

title: Cold One Chariots
description: A charge so devastating that it rends the flesh and bone from its victims.

title: Scourgerunner Chariots
description: Swift and untouchable to their foes, Scourgerunners can unleash a bombardment of powerful harpoons that can pierce even the toughest of hides.

title: Bloodwrack Shrine
description: To the Druchii, the scent of suffering is akin to the finest perfume, and no sound more despairing than the twisted echo of a shrine-bound Medusa.

title: Reaper Bolt Throwers
description: Their bolts strike with such force that, should their targets survive, they are unfit to live even as slaves.
